name: mullet
content:
mullet noun [C]
(FISH)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small sea fish that can be cooked and eaten: red mullet

mullet noun [C]
(HAIR)
informal a men's hairstyle, popular in the 1980s, in which the hair on top and at the sides of the head is short and the hair at the back is long
Anthony Redpath/Corbis/GettyImages
